content.text: Songz is some sort of Christian. Apparently, he was often taken to church by his devout grandmother, who sang in the choir.

content.sourceTitle: Trey Songz wearing a religious necklace
content.text: Also, he's sometimes spotted wearing a cross around his neck.
But that's about it. Oh, other than the rumors that he's "Illuminati,"

content.sourceTitle: Trey Songz Campaigns for Obama in Virginia
content.text: Songz seemingly isn't political–unless it's about Obama. During the 2012 elections, Songz was all over the president's reelection efforts. In his home state of Virginia, Songz held a "Gotta Vote" concert in hopes of getting people registered to vote.
And his twitter feed around election day in 2012 was full of supportive tweets, like:
Americans let your voice be heard!!! I spoke and said "OBAMA!!!!
Virginia lets go!!!! You know what we gotta do. Give our guy another 4 to push our country 4ward!!!
So, we've honed in on a label: Democrat. But that's as far as Songz will let us go at this time. Keep us updated in the comments.
